DCP

This panel controls 5 dust control modules, each module is outfitted with a Photohelic which monitors filter loading once the loading reaches the user defined set point it sends a signal back to the control panel which will start the blown down/cleaning process of the filters. This panel also has and end of shift button that when pressed will clean the filters and then shut its self off.

(800) 331-7744
